XenotypeDef.label: asari
XenotypeDef.description: Elegant mono-gender race. Native to the planet Thessia, Asari are often considered the most influential and respected sentient species in the galaxy, and are known for their, diplomacy and psychic aptitude.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Elegant mono-gender race. Native to the planet Thessia, Asari are often considered the most influential and respected sentient species in the galaxy, and are known for their, diplomacy and psychic aptitude.
